name: telescope-react-native
// targets: to see all targets run: nx show project telescope-react-native --web

package-android.command: cd apps/telescope-react-native/android && ./gradlew channelRelease && cd ../../../ && rm -rf dist/apks/telescope-react-native && mkdir -p dist/apks/telescope-react-native && mv apps/telescope-react-native/android/app/build/channels/*.apk dist/apks/telescope-react-native

build-windows-x86.command: cd apps/telescope-react-native && cargo tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --runner cargo-xwin

build-windows-arm.command: cd apps/telescope-react-native && cargo tauri build --target aarch64-pc-windows-msvc --runner cargo-xwin

build-macos-m1.command: cd apps/telescope-react-native && cargo tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin

build-macos-intel.command: cd apps/telescope-react-native && cargo tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin

build-macos-universal.command: cd apps/telescope-react-native && cargo tauri build --target universal-apple-darwin

build-linux-x86.command: cd apps/telescope-react-native && cargo tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

build-linux-arm.command: cd apps/telescope-react-native && cargo tauri build --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
